title: Trump cuts to science, medicine will hurt everyone, researchers say
shortDescription: How much has been cut or halted remains unclear; the Trump administration has not released a comprehensive, reliable accounting.

title: More than 200 TSA workers fired by Trump administration
shortDescription: The TSA confirmed the terminations of 243 probationary workers, citing "performance and conduct issues" with the employees.

title: Sen. Mitch McConnell will not seek reelection in 2026
shortDescription: U.S. Sen. Mitch McConnell, after spent decades in the nation's Capitol shaping Republican priorities, will not seek reelection when his term expires.

title: Royal remark from President Trump sparks backlash
shortDescription: The White House posted a quote from Trump calling himself "king" with a fake Time Magazine cover.

title: After LA blazes, Trump terminates workers who help fight forest fires
shortDescription: The U.S. Forest Service fired 2,000 probationary workers. The agency says none were "operational firefighters," but some helped battle wildfires.

title: Trump 'not happy with Boeing' over Air Force One planes
shortDescription: The comments were the White House's latest attempt to ratchet up pressure on Boeing.

title: Trump calls Zelenskyy a 'dictator without elections' | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A judge holds off on deciding whether to drop a corruption case surrounding New York City Mayor Eric Adams. This and more on The Excerpt.

title: Trump says feds should 'take over' Washington D.C.
shortDescription: Citing crime and homelessness in the national capital, President Trump said he wants the federal government to "take over" and govern Washington D.C.

title: Hegseth tells military to find $50 billion in funds for Trump programs
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said the funds will be pulled from 'so-called "climate change" and other woke programs.'

title: Trump gave schools 2 weeks to get rid of DEI. What if they don’t?
shortDescription: The Department of Education told schools they have two weeks to eradicate DEI or risk losing federal funds.

title: Appeals court rejects Trump's bid to curtail birthright citizenship
shortDescription: An appeals court let stand an order blocking President Donald Trump from curtailing automatic birthright citizenship nationwide.

title: Some GOP senators disagree with Trump branding Zelenskyy a 'dictator'
shortDescription: Senators also contradicted President Donald Trump's false claim that Ukraine started the war with Russia that began when Russia invaded its neighbor.

title: Reports: IRS to lay off around 6,000 workers amid Trump hiring freeze
shortDescription: The IRS reportedly plans to layoff around 6,000 employees amid a hiring freeze set by President Donald Trump.

title: Harris signs with Hollywood talent agency, joining Biden and Obama
shortDescription: Former Vice President Kamala Harris has signed with one of Hollywood's top talent firms, the Creative Artists Agency.

title: Civil rights groups sue Trump over anti-DEI orders
shortDescription: The National Urban League, National Fair Housing Alliance and AIDS Foundation of Chicago said Trump's orders posed an 'existential threat' to services

title: Trump's Army Corps seeks to fast-track 600 'emergency' projects
shortDescription: The fast-tracking of these projects could trigger legal fights, with environmental groups warning they are flouting federal laws.

title: Senate confirms Kelly Loeffler to head Small Business Administration
shortDescription: The Senate on Wednesday confirmed Kelly Loeffler, a former Georgia senator, to run the Small Business Administration.

title: Manipulated image shows Trump post about egg, gas prices | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no record of the post on Trump's Truth Social profile. There have also been no credible news reports covering the post as real.

title: Senate confirms Howard Lutnick for key role for Trump’s trade agenda
shortDescription: Billionaire Howard Lutnick confirmed as commerce secretary Tuesday night

title: Barron Trump 'oddity' flap: Top NYU Republican regrets quitting
shortDescription: Kaya Walker's remark drew swift backlash after it was shared by a popular conservative social media account.

title: Trump administration moves to nix NYC congestion pricing program
shortDescription: The Trump administration on Wednesday moved to end the polarizing New York City congestion pricing program.
